website_summaries.verdict: Reduces dashboard clutter by replacing a car’s rearview mirror. Offers crisp 1080p daylight recording.
pros: Mounts tightly to standard rearview mirror, offering an anti-glare mirror plus LED video screen
Front-facing dash cam has a wide viewing angle
cons: Power connector is set too close to mirror bracket, making it awkward to set in place
Only operates when car is running
Anti-glare mirror seems too dark at night

customer_reviews.title: This is why you want a dash cam
customer_reviews.text: I drive truck for a living Theres always close calls. I decided to get a dash cam,the price is good for what I need , the video quality is good saved me the hassle of trying to explain what happened
customer_reviews.author: Corey

customer_reviews.title: IMPORTANT!  Get the right SD card!!
customer_reviews.text: I'm giving a five star rating at this time because I like how it's made, even though the device has not been working because I got the SD card that Amazon suggested, which is not compatible with this device. I found out from the company that the video has not been looping because I purchased the SanDisk Ultra Plus 32 GB card. Visit the company website for a list of compatible cards ( The company rep was very helpful, and has guaranteed a replacement if, for some reason, the camera doesn't work with the new SD card that I plan to purchase tomorrow.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne

customer_reviews.title: Steer Clear!
customer_reviews.text: Many issues. The worst of which is RF noise that interferes with the auto radio. Secondly, the unit locks up every few days and has to be reset. Third, the rear view mirror is very dark.
customer_reviews.author: Russell T.

customer_reviews.title: Dashcam says it's recording even when it's not. Have ...
customer_reviews.text: Dashcam says it's recording even when it's not. Have had a number of incidents where I checked the SD card to see an incident and it wasn't there. The last time (today) it stopped recording two or three minutes before the incident and then not until I drove onto my driveway some 20 minutes later. No footage in between. Now I have to do some research to find one that works when you need it to. Unfortunately I have one of these in each of our cars.
customer_reviews.author: Michael & Kathy

customer_reviews.title: Good design for cam
customer_reviews.text: If you are trying to hide all the cable, this one is not for you, the converter of 12 volts to 5 volts is in the middle of the cable. Please see image. Good design for cam, but for cable management is so disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Ed

customer_reviews.title: No Longer Happy with it.
customer_reviews.text: Initially we loved this little camera. It has a lot of nice features and the video is clear and we used it all the time - UNTIL it began turning itself off whenever it wanted. If we got it turned back on it might stay on for a minute, 5 minutes or half hour - but it would always go dark and quit recording. I am going to try and return it for a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey H. Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Screw the NYC TLS
customer_reviews.text: To be honest I thought this was a neat thing that would come in handy someday but I never thought its greatest value would come by saving me a TON of time in dealing with an accident. Just show the cops the video, upload it to youtube to send to your insurance, and there's really nothing else they need from you.
customer_reviews.author: matma

customer_reviews.title: Rear-view mirror gives a better view of the rear interior or behind you
customer_reviews.text: The screen is a little hard to see while driving, but I know it is there incase I need it. Does not clutter the windshield. The power cord is of sufficient length that it can be tucked out of the way and not be seen. Rear-view mirror gives a better view of the rear interior or behind you. Be cautious though as it does not fit all rear-view mirrors. Does not fit my 2003 Chevrolet Pickup mirror. The mounting clamps do not open wide enough, but goes on easy over the car mirror. Easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Dashcam went dead after 3 months
customer_reviews.text: I got this dashcam 3 months ago brand new but now it wouldn't turn on. Updated the firmware per seller and it worked for another 4 days and then went dead again. I am going to contact the manufacturer and get the item fixed. The dashcam itself looks nice and solid. However, the control panel is not user friendly and rather confusing. It takes times to get used to it and you will probably have to look up the manual every time you want to make some changes to it.
customer_reviews.author: Randy, Houston

customer_reviews.title: Mounting system could be better. EXCELLENT WARRANTY SERVICE
customer_reviews.text: Great resolution, Menu and button identification could be easier to use. The only real issue is the springs that operate the two top clamp brackets are very strong...strong enough to break the molded plastic brackets on the bottom of the unit. The plastic broke after about 6 months use. I will submit a warranty claim. ****Follow up 1/7/17- Ultimately a product is only as good as the product support when something goes wrong. I must commend the folks at Papago, Inc. They responded in less than a day to my request for warranty service, sent a return authorization number and promptly replaced the unit.
customer_reviews.author: R. Hogue

customer_reviews.title: I don't think this is a good unit for use in a heavy truck
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for use in my service truck. I was unable to adjust the impact setting so that it was not constantly write protecting files and filling up the Crash Save directory. I turned off that feature and it seemed to be working ok until it quit working altogether 13 months after purchase. The sound also quit working before the unit died altogether. I don't think this is a good unit for use in a heavy truck. It might hold up better in a car that has a smoother ride.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Parrie

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: This product has helped me tremendously! The high-quality footage has assisted the police in an investigation and has gotten me out of a wrongful traffic ticket! I am sad to report that the power cord just stopped working. It blew 2 fuses in my car that I have had to replace. Now, I can't seem to find the right replacement cord.
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlyn

customer_reviews.title: Works great so far
customer_reviews.text: Works great so far. Instructions say to avoid using Sandisk SD cards! I got a 32gb Kingston and it works fine. Only real complaint is the fuse holder which is a small plastic rectangular box on the charge cord. Depending on your car it might be tricky to tuck that above your headliner. Wasn't a huge deal, but should have been better thought out. Plenty of cable so you can run it under the dash, up the A-pillar and back across the headliner.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Picture and video is great
customer_reviews.text: Works like a charm. I had another model from a Chinese supplier that crapped out on me after about 6 months. This one is way better. The one thing to keep in mind is that all memory has a limited life span, so pick up extra microSD cards. My camera runs about 8 hours a day, and after about 6 months, the card just gets worn out from all the rewriting of data...
customer_reviews.author: M.A.G.

customer_reviews.title: Buy new but got an damaged reboxed unit
customer_reviews.text: Buy new, got an open box or return unit with damages. Mounting screw hole damaged. Plastic bag for USB cable broken by someone. Not a new one in anyway. Returnd but totally waste my time.
customer_reviews.author: J. Chang

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent product and customer service is awesome. My power cord went bad (after 11 months of use) and they replaced for free. BTW, depth of view in their rear view mirror is no problem whatsoever. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Sing Young Min

customer_reviews.title: Great Dash Cam
customer_reviews.text: This has really worked out well. I have been using it for over a year now and I live in Phoenix where it gets to be 115 degrees on occasion and it still is working trouble free.
customer_reviews.author: Andy

customer_reviews.title: makes it easier to find the video you want towatch just hope accident doesnt happen in between that 5 ...
customer_reviews.text: froze one time. license plates cannot be read at night. records in 5 min interval. makes it easier to find the video you want to watch just hope accident doesnt happen in between that 5 min. otherwise everything the, said, specifications are great.
customer_reviews.author: EL

customer_reviews.title: Good video quality
customer_reviews.text: Good video quality, and good auto-dimming. The only issue I have is the voltage adapter is designed along the cable where it awkwardly protrude from the window rim on the passenger side (where I ran the cable). Otherwise really like it.
customer_reviews.author: MT00001

customer_reviews.title: It works, but would try another company if you want something simpler.
customer_reviews.text: Works great, but product registration is a total disaster. It's not even in English at some points. Micro SD card gets stuck inside and I have to take it out with small pliers. Updating the software is another unattended flaw. The steps change and they failed to update the site, leading to some very confusing moments.
customer_reviews.author: Try DIY

customer_reviews.title: Lasted for about a year and a half. The ...
customer_reviews.text: Lasted for about a year and a half. The unit started burning fuses and the unit stopped powering on shortly.
customer_reviews.author: Quan Trung Ta

customer_reviews.title: Very Good Dash Cam
customer_reviews.text: Works great! Functionality needs some time to get used to.
customer_reviews.author: Benji Chonga

customer_reviews.title: Video quality is excellen.
customer_reviews.text: Video quality is excellen. The mirror itself is a little odd. It takes some getting used to. All in all it's worth it. Out of the way so you don't even know it is there.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Completely satisfied. Great product, great value. Quick delivery. Easy installation. Can be moved from vehicle to vehicle.
customer_reviews.author: Alk

customer_reviews.title: Great features at a low price.
customer_reviews.text: I have one of these in each of my two cars and love them. I run them all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth D. Mcgee

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Been using mine daily for 3 years with no issues. I notice a lot of people complaining their stopped working. In noticed mine cutting in and out after i moved further out of the city. Turned out to be the motion sensor. If it is too dark outside, it will shut the camera off.
customer_reviews.author: Invers

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: it completely stop working at a year and 15 days. out of warranty now!
customer_reviews.author: luisrtbs

customer_reviews.title: Dark mirror
customer_reviews.text: The mirror is too dark. With tinted windows, I cannot see out of the back window at night or during the day if I am wearing sun glasses. The power cord interferes with accessing the Micro SD card (they could have routed it the other way).
customer_reviews.author: Robert L. Irby

customer_reviews.title: Not Happy
customer_reviews.text: Not please with this product, won't fit on mirrors on either of my two vehicles, after reading set up instruction, this item is not for the ordinary person unless only safe to use if you have a copilot, will give it to one of my kids that are more skilled in electronics.
customer_reviews.author: Gilmar engerdahl

customer_reviews.title: I like that it was a wider mirror too
customer_reviews.text: This thing is still going strong, the mirror made things smaller but I quickly got use to it. I like that it was a wider mirror too.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy Lim

customer_reviews.title: A second set of eyes for the road.
customer_reviews.text: Camera is still going strong almost one year after installation. Works well and captures all sorts of stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Purdue_Al

customer_reviews.title: I like it and it looks good but there is one ...
customer_reviews.text: I like it and it looks good but there is one major problem. The mirror itself is very wide which makes the rear view very tiny. It's very tough to see traffic behind you because of this.
customer_reviews.author: Kris

customer_reviews.title: Great so far
customer_reviews.text: Great so far, I've not needed to export video yet so I can't speak about that. So far no issues with reliability or failure due to heat in the dashboard.
customer_reviews.author: Bansidhe

customer_reviews.title: The video quality on 1080p is fantastic during the day and acceptable at night
customer_reviews.text: This is a really slim and well designed dashcam. The video quality on 1080p is fantastic during the day and acceptable at night. The only problem I encountered so far is that the cam froze when I unplug it from the 12V power without turning it off. It took the cam a good amount of time to shut down and restart. Besides this, it is a good product over all!
customer_reviews.author: Hunter D.

customer_reviews.title: Papago quality and features packed!
customer_reviews.text: The one thing I like about the Papago brand is the innovative features like motion detect, driver fatigue alert, stop and go alert, built in g-sensor etc... These features and the quality of its products are what set Papago apart from other dash cam brands. This is another great Papago product!
customer_reviews.author: bill payton

customer_reviews.title: Completely Satisfied with PAPAGO GS272-US GoSafe 272
customer_reviews.text: Excellent --easy to use. Good video, easy to transfer to permanent storage. InexpensiveMicroSD cards (32gb)canrecord a whole day's drive at 720p, 30 fps.
customer_reviews.author: Joel Williamson

customer_reviews.title: Works great. Not the best fit
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Not the best fit, and it does vibrate on the playback. But you can't tell while driving. Good enough.
customer_reviews.author: Scoopaloop

customer_reviews.title: I've had this now for about 3 months. So ...
customer_reviews.text: I've had this now for about 3 months. So far GoSafe is working flawlessly. Some people say they bought a lemon. I got a Cherry.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Value for the money!
customer_reviews.text: This one does the job perfectly. Good purchase. Happy with it. I would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Uma T.

customer_reviews.title: GoSafe260 GS260-US GoSafe 260 Full HD 1080P... ...
customer_reviews.text: GoSafe260 GS260-US GoSafe 260 Full HD 1080P... PAPAGO Inc.Works perfect
customer_reviews.author: Elouise H. McGimpsey

customer_reviews.title: Was perfect, except it vibrates when the car is turned ...
customer_reviews.text: Was perfect, except it vibrates when the car is turned on (2013 Civic). Had to return to Amazon because even though my rear view mirror is mounted securely, the vibration still persisted.
customer_reviews.author: Good Bird

customer_reviews.title: Never Again!!
customer_reviews.text: Well this has lasted just under one year. Now it keeps blowing fuses. It does not work unless its plugged in and if it keeps blowing fuses it won't work. Says its not returnable, had too long, I'd sure think it should last longer than 11 months for the price. Especially since it is a manufacture defect.
customer_reviews.author: Socalbeachbabe

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work properly
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't work properly. After couple hours of recording the screen starts to blink and stop recording so I have to format the sd card to start to record again. Very disappointed with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Paulo Mendonca

customer_reviews.title: No read Mic sd
customer_reviews.text: It doesn’t read the mic SD card, requested for return. But no repoonse
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A very good value.
customer_reviews.text: The manual is a bit hard to read but the camera is as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Wood Man

customer_reviews.title: Broken while try to install it
customer_reviews.text: I am too busy and try to install this one month after receiving it. While putting behind the mirror of my car, I realize my haands hurt because the surface was broken. If you want to buy this, try to be careful. It is sad I miss the return window but I definitely want to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry Lu

customer_reviews.title: Don't get if your rear windows are tinted
customer_reviews.text: I love this dash cam. The quality of the video is great. During the day you can see the license plates of cars near you, however at night the video gets a bit blurry because of the headlights of cars on the opposing side of the street. One thing that bothers me about this cam is that the mirror is dark. In the day this isn't a problem but at night I can hardly see anything if at all since my rear windows have 5% tint.
customer_reviews.author: Victor

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Product!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent recording quality. The mirror is working great for me, no more blinding from high beams, took me a couples uses for me to get used to the mirror's auto dimming.
customer_reviews.author: Francis Park

customer_reviews.title: Hands free!
customer_reviews.text: A friend recommended one of these and I have to say i like it. I don't play with it as much as some people , but I don't have to just hook it up and it records automatically when the car engine is turned on. So it is hands free once it is hooked up. I like that. Video is clear and smooth.
customer_reviews.author: Russ

customer_reviews.title: love it! clip on to rear mirror ensure it ...
customer_reviews.text: love it! clip on to rear mirror ensure it doesnt drop off.
customer_reviews.author: Darren Pang

customer_reviews.title: Do initial setup while plugged into car accessary socket.
customer_reviews.text: I received the Gosafe260 today. I tried to set it up by plugging it into a wall socket USB power adapter. No matter what I did, it was always in the Memory or PC monitor selection mode. I plugged the USB cable into my computer with the same results. I formatted the SD with my computer with the same results. As a last resort, I plugged it into my car accessory adapter and everything worked correctly. After formatting the SD while plugged into the car, everything works with it plugged into the house power. Bottom line, first time use, plug into the car accessory socket. Works perfectly now.
customer_reviews.author: Frank PoWell

customer_reviews.title: Still works like a charm
customer_reviews.text: bought it years ago. Still works like a charm. I like its AUTO DIM function which I did not have on my SUV.
customer_reviews.author: Chunpin Chen

customer_reviews.title: This is my 1st dash cam and I love it. Great video quality and easy to install
customer_reviews.text: This is my 1st dash cam and I love it. Great video quality and easy to install. I will get another for my wife's car.
customer_reviews.author: Austin R.

customer_reviews.title: ... mirror is a bit darker than what would be comfortable for me
customer_reviews.text: The mirror is a bit darker than what would be comfortable for me. Otherwise works well.
customer_reviews.author: MiPenna

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Great product and the price was very reasonable. For $89 you can't beat it.
customer_reviews.author: Dioscoro Segovia

customer_reviews.title: A good dash cam with wide rear mirror
customer_reviews.text: I have this dash cam for 13 months. It has been doing a good job without any issues.
customer_reviews.author: Chiawen C.

customer_reviews.title: Too dark at night
customer_reviews.text: Couldn't get adjusted to mirror. Just too dark at night
customer_reviews.author: jimmy

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars
customer_reviews.text: Dash cams are great as insurance in case of an accident. This dash cam is excellent in both quality and price. I would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: blue sky

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Was given as gift. Very easy to install. Recipient very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!!
customer_reviews.text: VERY simple to setup and use.. Quality of the video is just great as well.. No herky jerky recordings.. Picture quality is great.. The wire is super long and easy to route to the cigarette lighter for the power.. Wire just stuffs into the cracks around top of window down right side and under dash.. All you see is it plugged into the cigarette lighter.. Just plain smooth.. The mirror works great.. No high beams will distract me any longer.. I would HIGHLY recommend this to anyone wanting a forward facing cam for their vehicle..
customer_reviews.author: Phil

customer_reviews.title: Read this before placing your order
customer_reviews.text: the quality of the video clips is fine, although it is not very clear when it is dark like other dash cam. The problems I have with this product are: 1, it buzzes a lot. Finally I figured out that the noise comes from the cheap button panel... I have to tape it to prevent the vibrate. 2, it does NOT work with Sandisk SD card!! You will not have anything recorded! I learned that in the hard way. Other than those mentioned above, it works well.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Solid product. Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Great product and design. Since it's illegal to mount things on dashboard (people still do it anyways), this is a good design. Also, it's easier to operate the device since it's arm distance. I also found it convenient to not needing to put it away and hide it when I park unlike the old dash cam that I had. Pix quality is great at day and night. It's 1080HD after all. ** If you know how to hard wire the camera, it would be really great.
customer_reviews.author: Shane

customer_reviews.title: freezes whenever the camera is infront of bright light. ...
customer_reviews.text: freezes whenever the camera is infront of bright light. Stopped reading the card that was reading before. Cant use it now due to these problems.
customer_reviews.author: Mr D

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: this is my replacement for the first one and it didn't last a month it just stoped working
customer_reviews.author: stanley inn

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: The image in the mirror looked smaller than without installing this device.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: WOWSER GREAT!!!
customer_reviews.text: What the What... This camera is the BOMB! For the price. I had a few problems with the dash mount. the screen showed everything was right side up but recorded upside down. I got into the menu and did the 180 degree flip but then had problems noticing the buttons were opposite and messed up the SD card somehow. Bought a new card and it works just fine. Even had a fumble with and it landed on the concrete driveway and still works. GREAT PRODUCT! GREAT VIDEO! all the bells and things work fine. Was doing 49 mph in a 45 mph zone and it alerted me....A must have
customer_reviews.author: Reid Wilcox

customer_reviews.title: Probably a good camera, but lousy mirror
customer_reviews.text: This camera seems to have most any feature you might want if you take the time to decipher the instruction manual. I presume the original Taiwanese is clearer. The main reason I decided to return the camera is because the "automatic dimming mirror" which as best I can tell is marketingspeak for simply a dark mirror. I tried it for several days but I just couldn't get comfortable with just how dark it was. . I'm not sure what impact the device would have on our Bluetooth mic since it mounts in front of it but I wouldn't think it would be good.
customer_reviews.author: Laserguy

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Performed as expected. However, couldn't switch off the mic even though the icon on the screen indicated off.
customer_reviews.author: HK KUAN

customer_reviews.title: Great as a DVR not that great as a mirror
customer_reviews.text: Buttons feel a little cheap, don't like that it says Papago in top middle. Biggest frustration is the darkness. I have a tinted rear window and live in a sunny place so I'm constantly wearing sunglasses. It's too dark most of the time to see through the mirror. I think they tinted it since it doesn't have the tilting ability anymore they figured they'd just make it dark 100% of the time. Need a better solution, too dark as a mirror. Video and DVR functionality seems good.
customer_reviews.author: P. Vazquez

customer_reviews.title: Expectations Met!
customer_reviews.text: I am very satisfied with this dash cam. Working as expected.
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: Which is perfectly fine with me
customer_reviews.text: Took this out for a test ride. Before taking it out I went through the settings (took about 25 mins...had to turn off the bells and whistles) It records 3-5 mins of video (about 324 MB per file). Which is perfectly fine with me. The video is crystal clear. The drive was uneventful, so for the last 10 mins I turned it off. Of course that was when a Hawk decided to fly by as if mocking me. Otherwise, I have no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: S

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: This dash cam is feature packed. -Motion detection, when the dash cam detects motion it would automatically start recording when the car is parked. This is great to capture in incidents when the car owner is not around. -Loop recording, this dash cam automatically records over old content so you don't have to manually erase it. That means once it is setup you don't have to touch it again except when an accident happens. -Really good video quality, even at night. -Mirror dimming, this function is fine once you get used to it. This is one of the best dash cam I've used. I would highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: coney

customer_reviews.title: Good dash cam.
customer_reviews.text: Video quality is great. Although this is my first dash cam so I have nothing to compare it to. Did a lot of research before purchasing this product. Would have gotten 5 stars but a chip developed on the lower right hand side of the mirror under the glass sometime during a 2 day period when no one was in the vehicle. Amazon sent me a replacement right away. Before contacting Amazon I called the manufacturer, told them the problem which they advised to go through the return with Amazon and if Amazon wouldn't replace the product, Papago would. Great customer service from both Papago and Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Craig

customer_reviews.title: Love this dashcam!
customer_reviews.text: I love this dashcam! The IT guy where I work has this exact one and recommended it to me. He really knows his stuff so I listened to him. So glad I did - easy to set up, easy to use. I leave it plugged in and attached to my windshield at all times. Has not drained my battery, even after 3 days of being parked in a parking garage when I was at a business conference.
customer_reviews.author: Trish

customer_reviews.title: It's alright but there are better equipped dashcams for less money
customer_reviews.text: It was a nice device with really good HD video, but I returned it because it did not have a built in GPS. The company had a GPS device but that was another $40.00. My first dashcam that I've had for two years (R310 2.7-inch 140 degrees Dual Lens dash board camera car dvr black box video recorder + gps logger) had dual lenses to record what inside the car (with infrared light for night time recording) as well as GPS tracking. I used the unit in Europe last year and it logged street names and maps throughout the continent. This device, for the money, did not do as good a job as the earlier model that cost me $63.00
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My car doesnt have auto-dimming mirror. So when looking ...
customer_reviews.text: My car doesnt have auto-dimming mirror. So when looking for a clip-on with that feature, found this Gosafe. Not only it auto-dims, it also has a built-in dash-cam. In bz area where I live/drive, it helps to have a peace of mind that comes with recording what's happening on the road.
customer_reviews.author: RK

customer_reviews.title: Serious Problem
customer_reviews.text: Just discovered a serious problem. If you have a serious wreck & loose power to this item, the video recording will be distroyed. So, you will loose the very critical video recording that you bought this item to provide. If the unit is not shut down properly, like having an accident, the recording will be lost. Also, very difficult to take down and put back up on windshield suction cup assembly to hide it when necessary. Also, It will not hold the correct date & time. I just noticed all of my recordings are now showing date & time back in 2013.
customer_reviews.author: Spaceman

customer_reviews.title: Two Thumbs Up!
customer_reviews.text: Replace a lesser quality, stick on the windshield camera with this one. The slip over the rearview mirror is preferable. It operates perfect! Highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Marc T

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: Works well for its intended use. Very easy to setup. I took away a star because of the mirror part. It gives a much wider angle view, but everything seems much more "zoomed out" or further away than my stock mirror. I didn't like that.
customer_reviews.author: CoolCriSyS

customer_reviews.title: i got it for my road ragey husband
customer_reviews.text: wow the quality and audio is amazing! i can get
customer_reviews.author: Ciomara12

customer_reviews.title: It's a keeper
customer_reviews.text: Kind of skeptical about buying a camera online without actually seeing the quality, but after reading all the reviews, I decided to take a risk. So happy I did, this camera has great quality and works perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Camilla

customer_reviews.title: Remarkable
customer_reviews.text: Dashcam records easily both day and night, hides behind rear view mirror, video is with awesome clearity at 5min.in interviews. I went and got one for each vehicle.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Unit wasn't able to hold the time after stopping and ...
customer_reviews.text: Unit wasn't able to hold the time after stopping and starting my vehicle Reminder, the MFG won't take care of you if you buy it from Amazon Warehouse.
customer_reviews.author: KevinH

customer_reviews.title: It won't record.
customer_reviews.text: The red light turns on, yet it doesn't record. No video gets saved to the memory card. This is very frustrating and I've tried fixing it to no avail. I feel like I just wasted my money on this :(
customer_reviews.author: Ginger T.

customer_reviews.title: Good mirror (very helpful during the night to dim lights ...
customer_reviews.text: Good mirror (very helpful during the night to dim lights from car behind you) and good display and camera. No complaint after a couple of week.
customer_reviews.author: DudeDudeDude

customer_reviews.title: IT WORKS !!!!
customer_reviews.text: I had previously purchased a different dashcam from Amazon (manufacturer to be unnamed for now) and it lasted less than two weeks before dying completely. It started to act up in the first week. The Papago cam has worked flawlesslyl and the picture quality is very good for both day and night (the setting is on 1080). The user manual leaves a bit to be desired but when I have had questions or issues TEAM PAPAGO has been very prompt and helpful to address them. The support has been great on both telephone calls and emails. I would have no problem purchasing a Papago product in the future. One year later and still going strong +++++
customer_reviews.author: JR

customer_reviews.title: PAPAGO GS330 It works good. The unique thing on GS330 is its internal ...
customer_reviews.text: Buy the right thing: PAPAGO GS330 It works good. The unique thing on GS330 is its internal energy storage component. There is a super-capacitor inside instead of a battery which can set on fire under the exposure to high temperature during the summer. I think is unit uses a polarized lens which can somewhat eliminate the reflection of the wind shield. I watched a lot of sample vedio of dash cam and did compare them a lot. From the footage of other products, I can see a obvious reflection from the wind shield under strong sunlinght because they do not use a polarized lens. But, this product works well and does not have such problem.
customer_reviews.author: dfg445

customer_reviews.title: Good video quality and clips on nice to my existing ...
customer_reviews.text: Good video quality and clips on nice to my existing rear view mirror, also pretty easy to use. Since this does take the place of the current mirror, I expected it to literally take the place...The only problem I have with this is that I can't see out of it, especially through my back window. The mirror states it removes glare from other drivers, which is done by tinting the mirror permanately. Very hard to see through even in the daytime.

product_meta.title: GoSafe260 GS260-US GoSafe 260 Full HD 1080P Rear-view Mirror Mount Dashcam with 2.7" Display (Black)
product_meta.description: Style:1080P Full Mirror Mount Dashcam| Product Packaging:Standard PackagingThe GoSafe 260 is perfect for the individual that would rather use a rearview mirror and dash cam combination in place of their car's rearview mirror. The vivid results along with the crystal, clear capture rate of this is astounding. Clipping it on to your car's stock rearview mirror is seamlessly done with amazing results. The 2.7" screen captures a wide range with stunning quality. With an anti-glare mirror you will avoid any obtrusive lighting from the cars behind you and stay safer on the road.
feature_bullets: Record Full HD 1080P high resolution video with loop recording. Turns on automatically when car engine is on.
2.7" large display can be switched off while driving. The feature of Zoom +/- allows the driver to zoom in or out for capturing footage of a car's license plate.

While driving on the road, it happens that somebody’s headlights are excessively bright, creating an awful glare in your rear view mirror. This situation could be annoying for you and could be extremely dangerous. The GoSafe 260 comes with a mirror that automatically filters the extra bright beams of a car's headlights behind you. The mirror tends to have a darker grayish appearance than most stock rearview mirrors and you may need some time to get used to it, the benefit is that it detects bright light and automatically dims the reflection. Please note that objects in the mirror are closer than they appear.
Enlarged mirror surface gives drivers better viewing angle of the rear.
Motion Detection Mode: When parked, the device will detect motion and start to record video.
